review: I ordered my first one though Google. But My 2nd one was ordered right here. With free 2 day shipping why would I not. I love this little guy. Makes my non Smart TV a little bit smarter. author: OneTw0 "M Mehrizi"

review: Easy as can be to install. Plug it in, follow the prompts on your TV, tell it how to connect to wifi, install the app, and you are done. Streamed Netflix, Google Play, and Youtube within minutes of unpacking. Clearly, this is the way to go if you are in the Google/Android (or Apple) universe. Worked with both my Droid and my dad's iPhone. I suppose if you are a die-hard Apple fan, Apple TV does the same thing but at 3 times the cost, why?
